pronunciation.pinyin: guó jiā guǎng bō diàn shì zǒng jú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Guang3 bo1 Dian4 shi4 Zong3 ju2

meanings.value: National Radio and Television Administration (NRTA), formerly SAPPRFT, the State Administration of Press, Publication, Radio, Film and Television (2013-2018) and SARFT, the State Administration of Radio, Film, and Television (prior to 2013)
